【擴廠的專業人力需求】
千呼萬喚~邀請健康服務護理人員，我們一起健康向前走!
工作內容：
1.勞工健康服務相關規定、健康管理 (規劃與執行員工健康教育、衛生指導)
2.四大計畫執行協助
3.同仁緊急狀況處理
4.健康諮詢和衛教活動
5.職業病管理及預防

具備條件：
1. 護理師證照。
2. 勞工健康服務護理人員訓練結業證書。
3. 具備5 年以上區域或教學醫院工作經驗
4. 基本電腦文書處理(Excel、Word、PowerPoint)
5.具執行健康管理、辦理健康促進活動能力
6. 高抗壓性、可獨立作業、主動積極、善溝通協調、具邏輯統合能力。

column1: 由蘇冠賓教授、張倍禎醫師帶領的身心介面研究團隊，過去十多年來致力於憂鬱症及兒青身心疾病的醫學研究，獲得國衛院、科技部及學術單位多年期計畫支持。研究範疇包含臨床試驗、動物模型及細胞分子機制。歡迎對醫學研究有興趣、樂於挑戰、喜歡解決問題、能自我管理、獨立作業且重視團隊合作的人員加入，有臨床試驗、醫療機構工作經驗者優先考慮，待遇可面議。(本職務地點位於台南市立安南醫院，專/兼任均可)

column2: 計畫主持人：蘇冠賓教授 (https://sites.google.com/site/omega3su/home/ )、張倍禎醫師 ( https://mbilab.lib.cmuh.org.tw/web/page/PeiChenChang，http://jpcchang.blogspot.com )

column2: Confirm all Air Products San Fu and subsidiaries are compliance with all local environmental regulations to achieve EHS KPI target.
Regularly review related regulations to look for changes, and then communicate the changes to the site managers.
Confirm all Air Products San Fu and subsidiaries are compliance with all AP environmental standards, or the stringent ones compared to the local regulations.
Identities and analyzes complex EH&S laws and regulations to determine impact to businesses and operations.
Facilitate site managers at sites are familiar with regulations and AP environmental standards.
Routine audits at all sites to identify gaps with regulations or AP standards.
To join environment events investigations as requested to determine the root causes and develop the corrective and preventive actions.
Help the site managers develop their own improvement plans.
Maintain the integrity of the environment management system including GHG related activities on the sites which have been certified / verified, and assist the third-party audit.
Support the application of ISO 14001 certification for certain sites which are under the request from customer to obtain the certification.
Support the application of GHG related verification for certain sites which are under the request from customer.
Ensure that sites to report GHG emissions data to government authority with specified period.

Participate in global environmental initiatives and be connected with global and regional AP resources.  Communicate local issues to the global network and implement best practices at local organizations.
Maintain Compliance Management (CM) System.

Job Incumbent is expected to have minimum 5 years' work experience in a similar work environment, as in a manufacturing plant.
License in Toxic Chemical substance, waste disposal, wastewater treatment and air emission management are a plus.
Good command of English in reading, speaking and writing.
Work experience in government regulatory agencies such as EPA or EPB, with excellent connection with inspectors is a plus.
Job requires frequent traveling within Taiwan cities.
